EmailTemplate.name: Software Evergreen Service.05-03-21 BNK SES Email 2.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: ATM Thieves Are Exploiting This Weakness
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Software vulnerabilities mean fraudsters can escape with millions—in minutes. Without ever getting up from their computer. Keeping on top of every software update for the multitude of components that enable your ATM network to run securely can feel daunting. But the price of not doing it? That’s huge – with the potential for financial loss, compromised customer trust and negative impact to your brand. The good news is you can have a trusted partner handle it for you. Learn how in our latest infographic. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
